model

Class MouseWatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.MouseWatcher

  • public class MouseWatcher
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for managing components' interactions with the mouse
    Author:
    Spencer Yoder

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  MouseWatcher.Node
      A Node in the LinkedList containing the Components

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private ClickableComponent activeComponent
      The Component over which the mouse is hovering
      private java.awt.Canvas canvas
      The canvas to read the mouse position from
      private MouseWatcher.Node head
      The front of the linked list containing the components
      private java.util.ArrayList<MouseWatcher.Node> tempList

    • Constructor Detail

      • MouseWatcher

        public MouseWatcher(java.awt.Canvas canvas)
        Constructs a new MouseWatcher which receives a mouse position from the given canvas
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • addComponent

        public void addComponent(ClickableComponent c)
        Adds the given ClickableComponent to the MouseWatcher. The Component is added to the LinkedList in order of its distance to the point (0, 0)
        Parameters:
        c - the Component to add
        See Also:
        ClickableComponent.compareTo(ClickableComponent)

      • temporaryAdd

        public void temporaryAdd(ClickableComponent c)
        Adds a Component which will later be removed from the MouseWatcher
        Parameters:
        c - the Component to add

      • checkComponents

        public void checkComponents()
        Checks each component (within the scope of the mouse)
        See Also:
        Bound.withinScope(Point), ClickableComponent.reactToMouse(Point)

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a String representation of the LinkedList for debugging

      • handleClick

        public void handleClick()
        Delegate the mouse click to the component the mouse is currently hovering over.
        See Also:
        ClickableComponent.onClick()

      • addNode

        private void addNode(MouseWatcher.Node n)
        Adds a Node to the linked list
        Parameters:
        n - the Node to add

      • remove

        public void remove(ClickableComponent c)
        Removes a ClickableComponent from the list
        Parameters:
        c - the component to remove
